title: Metallica
content:
okay, so i'm obsessed with dave mustaine & megadeth, i listen to them most of the time & know i want to hear some metallica, can you recommend some of their good albums that are worth listening to?[url=http://www.ironmaiden.com][img]http://i11.photobucket.com/albums/a199/rorie1983/ironmaiden.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://simplythebest.net/fonts/fonts/font_downloads/iron_maiden.zip]Download the Iron Maiden font[/url]

title: Re: Metallica
content:
I thought they were 'to loud and noisy' for you?
Well only they first five albums are good.
Listen to Kill 'em all if you want to listen to some songs that Mustaine (co-)wrote.
Listen to Ride the Lightning and Master of Puppets if you want to hear them at their best
Listen to ...And justice for all if you hate base guitar.
Listen to Black Album if you like short song.-----------------
[img]http://www.geocities.com/anthalerero/pic/banner_eurovision.jpg[/img]

title: Re: Metallica
content: Avoid St. Anger's Day at all costs.[img]http://www.denness.net/rpi/username/mr12000[/img]

title: Re: Metallica
content: Listen to the S&M record too, it rocks...

title: Re: Metallica
content:
Some songs work out well with the orchestra but some don't. The song selection isn't to good either; to much songs from load, reload and no songs from Kill 'em all, plus James can't really sing anymore like he used to.
So I have to disagree here, first five albums are much more interesting.
-----------------
[img]http://www.geocities.com/anthalerero/pic/banner_eurovision.jpg[/img]

title: Re: Metallica
content: okay i listened to some samples from ride the lightning & have put it on hold at my library i only plan to rip a few tracks as i don't like all the songsRorie

title: Re: Metallica
content:
S&M may not be the "best" album but it is very interesting, a thrash metal band with an orchestra?

But I agree, the song selection is very bad although I think it doesnt get better than The Call of Ktulu with an orchestra...

title: Re: Metallica
content: ok i purchased master of puppets [url=http://www.dirtcheapcds.com.au/productDisplay.php?id=922&cdOrDVD=0]here[/url] for $10, now i need to find a another cheaper source to buy kill 'em all & ride the lightning can anyone help me?Rorie
